_meta.description: Lighting presets for creative prompt engineering

presets.name: Golden Hour
presets.promptFragment: golden hour lighting, warm sunlight casting long shadows, soft amber glow
presets.description: The magical window shortly after sunrise or before sunset when light is warm, diffused, and directional

presets.name: Rembrandt
presets.promptFragment: Rembrandt lighting, dramatic triangle of light on cheek, deep shadows on one side
presets.description: Classic portrait lighting creating a small triangle of light on the shadowed cheek, named after the Dutch master painter

presets.name: Butterfly / Paramount
presets.promptFragment: butterfly lighting, overhead key light, symmetrical shadow beneath nose, glamorous illumination
presets.description: Light positioned directly above and in front of the subject creating a butterfly-shaped shadow under the nose, classic Hollywood glamour technique

presets.name: Split
presets.promptFragment: split lighting, half face illuminated half in deep shadow, stark contrast
presets.description: Light hits exactly one half of the face while the other half remains in shadow, creating a bold 50/50 divide

presets.name: Rim / Edge
presets.promptFragment: rim lighting, bright edge light outlining the subject, backlit contour glow
presets.description: Light placed behind the subject creating a bright outline or halo effect that separates subject from background

presets.name: Neon / Cyberpunk
presets.promptFragment: neon lighting, vibrant colored neon glow, cyan and magenta reflections, cyberpunk atmosphere
presets.description: Colorful artificial neon lights casting vivid colored reflections, evoking a futuristic urban nightscape

presets.name: Natural Daylight
presets.promptFragment: natural daylight, bright even illumination, clear sky ambient light
presets.description: Clean, bright, and evenly distributed outdoor light on a clear day

presets.name: Studio Softbox
presets.promptFragment: studio softbox lighting, soft diffused professional illumination, even skin tones
presets.description: Professional studio lighting with large softbox diffusers producing smooth, flattering, and controlled illumination

presets.name: Harsh Directional
presets.promptFragment: harsh directional lighting, strong hard shadows, high contrast single light source
presets.description: Undiffused point light source creating sharp, well-defined shadows and extreme contrast

presets.name: Volumetric / God Rays
presets.promptFragment: volumetric lighting, god rays streaming through atmosphere, visible light beams in haze
presets.description: Visible shafts of light passing through fog, dust, or openings, creating dramatic beams of illumination

presets.name: Chiaroscuro
presets.promptFragment: chiaroscuro lighting, extreme contrast between light and dark, Renaissance-style dramatic illumination
presets.description: The bold contrast technique perfected by Caravaggio â€” deep blacks against concentrated areas of bright light

presets.name: Overcast / Diffused
presets.promptFragment: overcast diffused lighting, soft even illumination, no harsh shadows, cloudy sky light
presets.description: Clouds act as a giant natural softbox, producing shadowless, evenly diffused illumination

presets.name: Backlit / Silhouette
presets.promptFragment: backlit silhouette lighting, subject against bright background, dark outline, lens flare
presets.description: Primary light source behind the subject creating a dark silhouette form against a bright background

presets.name: Candlelight / Warm Glow
presets.promptFragment: candlelight warm glow, soft flickering amber illumination, intimate low-light atmosphere
presets.description: Warm, dim, flickering light from candles or similar sources creating an intimate close-range glow
